title: 檔案
noPDFSupport: 您的瀏覽器不支援 PDF 檔案格式。請下載此 PDF 檔案後閱讀。
cantBePreviewed: 抱歉，本文件不支持預覽。

shareModal.title: 分享文件
shareModal.description: 複製以下連結並與您的朋友分享。

deleteModal.descriptionItem: {count, plural, other {您確定要刪除{count}个项目嗎？本操作不可撤銷。}}
deleteModal.descriptionFolder: {count, plural, other {您確定要刪除{count}个文件夾嗎？本操作不可撤銷。}}
deleteModal.descriptionFile: {count, plural, other {您確定要刪除{count}个文件嗎？本操作不可撤銷。}}

addByPathModal.title: 從 IPFS 新增
addByPathModal.description: 輸入 IPFS 路徑 (CID) 來新增。

newFolderModal.title: 新增資料夾
newFolderModal.description: 輸入您想要創建的資料夾名稱

welcomeInfo.header: 歡迎使用 IPFS Web UI
welcomeInfo.paragraph1: <0>檢查您的<0>節點狀態</0>, 用戶 ID、連線訊息、網路傳輸和已連接用戶數量。</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph2: <0>更簡易<1>管理您的 IPFS 庫中檔案</1>。您能拖放來添加檔案，並移動、重新命名、刪除、分享、下載檔案。</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph3: <0>您能<1>瀏覽 IPLD 資料</1>來深入了解 IPFS 是如何運作。</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph4: <0>查看您所有的<1>已連接用戶數量</1>，通過他們的 IP 位址來定位。</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph5: <0>檢閱您的<0>IPFS 結點設定</0>，並將其更新以更符合您的需求。</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph6: <0>如果你想幫助推動 Web UI 發展，請<1>查看原始碼</1>或<3>回報問題</3>!</0>

filesList.noFiles: <0>這個資料夾沒有檔案。請點擊"新增"按鈕新增檔案。</0>

addFilesInfo: <0>Add files to your local IPFS node by clicking the <1>Add to IPFS</1> button above.</0>
companionInfo: <0>As you are using <1>IPFS Companion</1>, the files view is limited to files added while using the extension.</0>

step1.title: 檔案頁面
step1.paragraph1: <0>This is where the files on your <1>Mutable File System (MFS)</1> live. You can add files or folders and manage them from this page.</0>

step2.title: 導覽列
step2.paragraph1: The current work directory, you can navigate through the folder hierarchy by clicking on them.

step3.title: 新增檔案
step3.paragraph1: Here you can see how many blocks and files you have pinned.
step3.paragraph2: You can add files or folders to your repo through the dropdown on the right.
step3.paragraph3: <0>If you want to add something that is already on IPFS, you can import it to your MFS by passing its <1>Content Identifier (CID)</1>.</0>

step5.title: 檔案清單
step5.paragraph1: Finally, the listing where you can find your files and folders. Drag and drop files or folders to add them.
step5.paragraph2: You can share or download files, inspect them in the IPLD Explorer, rename or delete them!
step5.paragraph3: Pro tip: drag and drop a file from any other page of the Web UI to add them to the root of your MFS.

cidNotFileNorDir: The current link isn't a file, nor a directory. Try to <0>inspect</0> it instead.
